name: Ultimate Survival Expert
description: Master the art of survival in the harshest environments!
Learn to thrive where others would perish and overcome any obstacle.

objectives.survive_arctic: Survive 7 days in the arctic tundra
objectives.hunt_wild_game: Hunt and cook 20 different wild animals

dialogs.start: Nature is both beautiful and deadly. Are you prepared to learn her secrets?
dialogs.training: In survival, preparation and knowledge are more valuable than any weapon.
dialogs.hardship: You've endured where others would fall. Your resilience grows stronger.
dialogs.mastery: Few understand the wilderness as intimately as you now do.
dialogs.challenge: The ultimate test awaits. Thirty days with nothing but your skills.
dialogs.complete: You are now the Ultimate Survival Expert! Nature herself bows to your expertise!
